name: JsTooltip
body:

This is a tooltip.

```` Example 2:

HTML Tooltip Content

Pellentesque erat hendrerit eu. Nam et justo nunc. Mauris fringilla ipsum at orci blandit tristique.

````html

note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
